snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a former member of Twitter's board worried about changes at the service, a taxi-hailing app offering free cab...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a former member of Twitter's board worried about changes at the service, a taxi-hailing app offering free cab rides and a start-up carmaker's plan to change the way vehicles are sold.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: New Raspberry Pi and Revamping Google
